scripts.db:reset: pnpm schema:drop && pnpm schema:update && pnpm seed:run

scriptsComments.dev: Runs watcher dev server, see https://github.com/nodejs/node/issues/30810#issuecomment-1446093458 for no-warnings
scriptsComments.build: Compiles typescript into javascript, then bundles our public files
scriptsComments.start: Runs the compiled (build) version of our code rather than dev server
scriptsComments.schema:update: RESETS the REAL database and updates its schema to match our entities code. DO NOT USE ME IN PRODUCTION!
scriptsComments.schema:drop: Drops all database tables + associated data
scriptsComments.seed:create: Creates a new seeder file in db/seeders
scriptsComments.seed:run: Runs all seeders to add default info to our database
scriptsComments.db:reset: Completely updates our database to match our source code
